<Saint Fulrad

Text: Fulrad:  He was the counselor of both Pippin and Charlemagne.
Triplets:<Fulrad

<Text: Fulrad:  During his time under Charlemagne, he had dealings with the papacy again for different reasons.>

7:
--------------------
Text: Fulrad:  When he became Abbot of St. Denis (N.E of Paris), Fulrad’s life became important in the lives of distinct historical figures in various ways during his period as St. Denis’s abbot during the mid-eighth century.
Triplets:<Fulrad
8:
--------------------
<Text: Fulrad:  Saint Fulrad’s Feast Day is on July 16.>
